item.description:
Friday, March 27th, 2009 from 7 to 8:30 PM
Join Isabeau Esby, internationally known Psychic Medium, for a night of spiritual knowledge.
What is it that loved ones really want to say to you after theyâ€™ve died?
Where are they?
How are they spending their time?
Isabeau will share stories, experiences and concepts in a night that will leave you pondering the realities of the other side. A question and answer session will follow.
Speaker - Isabeau Esby www.IsabeauEsby.com
Cost - $10 per person
item.how_to_find_us: Calypso is located next door to the Seacoast Repertory Theater
item.name: Lecture - What the Dead Really Want to Say, Stories of a Psychic Medium
